verses.verse: "I <S%H6962>loathe<s%> my own <S%H9132>life;<s%> I will <S%H5800>give<s%> <S%H5800>full<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H5800>vent<s%> to my <S%H7879>complaint;<s%> I will <S%H1696>speak<s%> in the <S%H4751>bitterness<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
"I will <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H433>God,<s%> 'Do not <S%H7561>condemn<s%> me; Let me <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H5921>why<s%> <S%H4100><s%> Thou dost <S%H7378>contend<s%> with me.

'Is it <S%H2896>right<s%> for Thee <S%H3588>indeed<s%> to <S%H6231>oppress,<s%> To <S%H3988>reject<s%> the <S%H3018>labor<s%> of Thy <S%H3709>hands,<s%> And to <S%H3313>look<s%> <S%H3313>favorably<s%> on the <S%H6098>schemes<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>?
'Hast Thou <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H1320>flesh<s%>? <S%H518>Or<s%> dost Thou <S%H7200>see<s%> as a <S%H582>man<s%> <S%H7200>sees<s%>?
'Are Thy <S%H3117>days<s%> as the <S%H3117>days<s%> of a <S%H582>mortal,<s%> <S%H518>Or<s%> Thy <S%H8141>years<s%> as man's <S%H3117>years,<s%>
That Thou shouldst <S%H1245>seek<s%> for my <S%H5771>guilt,<s%> And <S%H1875>search<s%> after my <S%H9128>sin<s%>?
<S%H5921>'According<s%> to Thy <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> I am <S%H3588>indeed<s%> not <S%H7561>guilty;<s%> Yet <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5337>deliverance<s%> from Thy <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
'Thy <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H9426>fashioned<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> me <S%H3162>altogether,<s%> <S%H5439><s%> And wouldst Thou <S%H1104>destroy<s%> me?
<S%H2142>'Remember<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> that Thou hast <S%H6213>made<s%> me as <S%H2563>clay;<s%> And wouldst Thou <S%H7725>turn<s%> me into <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>?
'Didst Thou not <S%H5413>pour<s%> me out like <S%H2461>milk,<s%> And <S%H7087>curdle<s%> me like <S%H1385>cheese;<s%>
<S%H3847>Clothe<s%> me with <S%H5785>skin<s%> and <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> And <S%H9360>knit<s%> me <S%H9360>together<s%> with <S%H6106>bones<s%> and <S%H1517>sinews<s%>?
'Thou hast <S%H6213>granted<s%> me <S%H9132>life<s%> and <S%H2617>lovingkindness;<s%> And Thy <S%H6486>care<s%> has <S%H8104>preserved<s%> my <S%H7307>spirit.<s%>
'Yet <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H428>things<s%> Thou hast <S%H6845>concealed<s%> in Thy <S%H3824>heart;<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H384>this<s%> is <S%H5973>within<s%> Thee:
<S%H518>If<s%> I <S%H2398>sin,<s%> then Thou wouldst <S%H8104>take<s%> <S%H8104>note<s%> of me, And wouldst not <S%H5352>acquit<s%> me of my <S%H5771>guilt.<s%>

<S%H518>'If<s%> I am <S%H7561>wicked,<s%> <S%H480>woe<s%> to me! And if I am <S%H6663>righteous,<s%> I dare not <S%H5375>lift<s%> up my <S%H7218>head.<s%> [I am] <S%H7649>sated<s%> with <S%H7036>disgrace<s%> and <S%H7202>conscious<s%> of my <S%H6040>misery.<s%>
'And should [my head] be <S%H1342>lifted<s%> up, Thou wouldst <S%H6679>hunt<s%> me like a <S%H7826>lion;<s%> And <S%H7725>again<s%> Thou wouldst <S%H6381>show<s%> Thy <S%H6381>power<s%> against me.

'Thou dost <S%H2318>renew<s%> Thy <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> <S%H5048>against<s%> me, And <S%H7235>increase<s%> Thine <S%H9213>anger<s%> <S%H5973>toward<s%> me, <S%H2487>Hardship<s%> after <S%H6635>hardship<s%> is with me.
<S%H4100>'Why<s%> then hast Thou <S%H3318>brought<s%> me out of the <S%H7358>womb<s%>? Would that I had <S%H1478>died<s%> and <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%> had <S%H7200>seen<s%> me!
'I should have <S%H1961>been<s%> as <S%H9201>though<s%> I had not <S%H1961>been,<s%> <S%H2986>Carried<s%> from <S%H990>womb<s%> to <S%H6913>tomb.<s%>'
"Would He not <S%H2308>let<s%> my <S%H4592>few<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H2308>alone<s%>? <S%H7896>Withdraw<s%> from me that I may <S%H1082>have<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H1082>cheer<s%>
<S%H2962>Before<s%> I <S%H1980>go<s%> – and I shall not <S%H7725>return<s%> – To the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness<s%> and <S%H6757>deep<s%> <S%H6757>shadow;<s%>

The <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5890>utter<s%> <S%H5890>gloom<s%> as <S%H652>darkness<s%> [itself,] Of <S%H6757>deep<s%> <S%H6757>shadow<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H5468>order,<s%> And which <S%H3313>shines<s%> as the <S%H652>darkness.<s%>"
